original_text: When they baptized you, it was like God buried you with Christ. And God also raised you to a new life with Christ. You believed that God has great power to do that. You believed that God raised Jesus to life after he died. Because you believed, God raised you to have a new life.
korean_text: 너희가 세례로 그리스도와 함께 장사되고 또 죽은 자들 가운데서 그를 일으키신 하나님의 역사를 믿음으로 말미암아 그 안에서 함께 일으키심을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: it was like God buried you with Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그리스도와 함께 당신을 장사하신 것과 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: to a new life with Christ
You believed that God has great power
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님께서 큰 능력을 가지고 계심을 믿었습니다

sentences.original_text: You believed that God raised Jesus
God raised you to have a new life
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 새로운 삶을 갖도록 일으키셨습니다
